html:
(24) No sweet cane . . .—Probably some species of Amomum for the anointing oil (Exodus 30:23). It is distinguished from the incense, and is not one of the ingredients (Exodus 30:34).

Thou hast made me to serve.—The verbs ofIsaiah 43:23 are repeated with the emphasis of scorn, the thought being analogous to that ofIsaiah 1:14 . The people had made this hypocritical worship as a service which their God had to endure, till He was altogether weary of it.
